Course Description: DESIGNED FOR NON-ACCOUNTING MAJORS, THIS COURSE FOCUSES ON HOW MANAGERS USE QUANTITATIVE AND QUALITATIVE ACCOUNTING INFORMATION FOR DECISION-MAKING INDIVIDUALLY AND AS MEMBERS OF A MANAGEMENT TEAM. THE COURSE EMPLOYS TECHNOLOGY TOOLS TYPICALLY USED  BY MANAGERS, E.G., SPREADSHEET SOFTWARE AND THE INTERNET. STUDENTS WILL APPLY AND LINK COURSE KNOWLEDGE IN A COMPREHENSIVE OUTSIDE ASSIGNMENT AS A REQUIREMENT OF THIS COURSE.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
